ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller

Class LightLocalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.controller.LightLocalization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LightController

    public class LightLocalization
extends java.lang.Object
implements LightController
    Performs light localization which allows to set the X and Y of the odometer. LightLocalization class localizes by getting the derivative of the light level. This allows to flag if a line is passed regardless of the initial light source. While spinning, the angles at which the lines are crossed are noted and used to calculate the X and Y of the robot.
